Attacks.Name: Freezing Glare
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Galarian Articuno gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psycho Cut
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Stagger special condition. After this attack is resolved, Galarian Articuno may advance M.

Attacks.Name: Hurricane
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target are pushed away S and gain the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Competitive
Superpowers.Effect: When Galarian Articuno is targeted by an enemy attack or superpower and suffers no damage, it gains 1 additional power.

Superpowers.Name: Mind Shield
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of Galarian Articuno's next activation, it adds 2 dice to its defense rolls against mystic attacks.

Attacks.Name: Mystic Storm
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, the target character gains the Stun and Slow special conditions. Galarian Articuno heals 2 damage.

Superpowers.Name: Psychic Rejuvenation
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 3 damage from Galarian Articuno. After using this superpower, Galarian Articuno gains the Stagger special condition.
